message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive deal on this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. Let me know if this is something you'd like to take a closer look at!

Thanks for the offer, Alice!  This product sounds great. However,  I'm looking to spend a bit less. Would you be willing to go down to $10000?  I'm really interested in this item, and I think this price would be fair for both of us.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand you're looking to spend a bit less, but I still need to make a profit on this deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer you the product for $11000. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in!
